channel.title: Posts on T. Midi
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on T. Midi

item.title: Hugo Markdown language
item.description: CSS syntax highlight (GitHub-Flavored) Markdown Editor Basic useful feature list: Ctrl+S / Cmd+S to save the file Ctrl+Shift+S / Cmd+Shift+S to choose to save as Markdown or HTML Drag and drop a file into here to load it File contents are saved in the URL so you can share files I’m no good at writing sample / filler text, so go write something yourself. Look, a list!

item.title: OSSEC - log rotation
item.description: body { font-family: "Noto Sans", sans-serif; } from pygments.styles import get_all_styles styles = list(get_all_styles()) print styles When SELinux enabled, some OSSEC packages will fail to rotate logs under /var/ossec/logs, which will result in crontab errors and in some cases failure to write to logs. One way to fix this is to change context type, for this let’s first check the current context:
